name: Inland Paraflite, Inc.
about: Inland Paraflite, Inc. is a Veteran-owned flight training school located in Apple Valley, California, specializing in powered parachute aviation. With over 30 years of experience, we offer comprehensive training programs from introductory flights to FAA certifications for the Sport Pilot powered parachute license. Our 14-day accelerated sport pilot course includes all required FAA dual flight training, solo time, and necessary materials. We are dedicated to providing a safe and supportive environment for students to embark on their skyward adventures. Join us to experience the thrill of powered parachute flying with expert instruction.
